channel.title: Client troubles
channel.description: :confused: hey guys i have downloaded a 667 loading 711 source and client. i have done all that changing compiler and client bullshit. but when i got the client working it just sat at 1 percent (all i did was change it to my jdk and delete the (x86) and it started to run but then That happened :confused:) Can one of your mopar godz help me? :)

item.title: Client troubles
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

oic… why would you post this here? why wouldnt you just pm me that or something But wait what are you having troubles with exactly? you alredy portforwarded it but you cant connect the client to the source… ive never had that happen to me before did you try looking through your client files and source files theres gotta be something fucking it up… but honestly bro im not that good at coding so i realy would not know

Read full topic

gimpie:

hey guys i have downloaded a 667 loading 711 source and client. i have done all that changing compiler and client bullshit. but when i got the client working it just sat at 1 percent (all i did was change it to my jdk and delete the (x86) and it started to run but then That happened ) Can one of your mopar godz help me?

ive got a bigger problem man
ive done portforward
done no ip duc then i cannot let client connect on a source never done a server inmy life this was my 1st try i think im a give up no1 helps
